en.today: Try to curb stubborn behaviors this morning, dear Aries, as the Leo quarter moon brews tension. Big egos will clash but try to determine what's truly worth fighting for. Now is also a good time to focus on reinforcing your emotional wellbeing by embracing activities that generate confidence. Creative outlets will be particularly healing, though time spent with your bestie also promises to soothe the spirit. Look for opportunities to express yourself and gain attention when Mercury stirs. Your words will travel further than you might think when Luna and Jupiter form an expensive connection later tonight.

en.today: The quarter moon rises in your sign this morning, dearest Leo. This energy will be intense yet rewarding, revealing obstacles so you can strategize a way around them. Try to be patient with your process, trusting that you will persevere and find success when the time is right. You'll have a chance to make good first impressions as the hours pass, so be mindful to put your best foot forward. Connect with your higher power when Mercury stirs this evening, watching for signs and blessings. Look for opportunities to expand socially when Luna aspects Jupiter later tonight.

en.today: Emotions will feel more intense and raw this morning, dear Taurus, as the Leo quarter moon rises. Try to separate your pride from situations that have disappointed you recently, focusing instead on ways to soothe and nurture the heart. The energy lightens as the hours pass, and joyful moments will brighten the mood of your home. Connect with family and close friends to make the most of these vibes. Schedule some much-needed alone time when Mercury stirs, asking you to reflect. Close out your weekend with a few luxurious indulgences when Luna and Jupiter align later tonight.

Get out and seek action when Luna and Jupiter align later tonight, putting you in the mood to be seen.
